event.title: Karsten Gerloff on Free Software and compliance
event.body: On March 20, FSFE's president Karsten Gerloff will discuss Free Software and compliance at a seminar in Tokyo, Japan. As Free Software permeates ever more areas of commercial activity, it is important for companies to understand what they need to do in order to fulfil their obligations under Free Software licenses, and to develop best practices to manage the use of Free Software in their products.
